name: Shipbreakers
description:
Ahoy, buccaneers. Tear apart the seven seas in this fast paced arcade shooter and cover the abyss with the wrecks of your enemies. Hire vicious sea wolfs as your crew members and board other ships to unlock crazy weapons and become the fiercest pirate of this little planet.

  • The Spherical Arena
  • Fast naval combats
  • Stylish low poly art
  • Challenging missions
